title: The Decent Humanoids Wiki
overview: Welcome to the Decent Humanoids Wiki. Let's get started
left1: Baelok, Anak, DM, Maeve, Xalys, Viz
title3: Stick Em With the Pointy End
History: Why not start by looking up one of our main cast members?
Future: They say a man with many hats is very fashionable. This is true. I am fashionable. Look up one of the many NPC's played by me, the Dungeon Master.
Gallery: Here you'll find entries about the cool items the group used.

title: Maeve Leaflock
overview: The stealthy by choice, firecracker by nature, Rogue of the Decent Humanoids
left1: Maeve checking if the coast is clear before continuing her stealth mission
History: Maeve wasn't always level 13, but she was always a badd ass bitcchh.
Future: Maeve now resides in the reconstructed Dunshire with her family. She enjoys sparring with Trove when Trove is in town, and playing with her brother Jax.
